text: Sihamtaka lagate arau yibora janapadara majata ami barakata dichilo, se'iborara madhyararti sthanata ami drsyamana bahuto janapada sthapana karaichilo arau se'ibora janapadata bhramanara babe yathayatha byarastha karaichilo. Kaichilo, ‘tomaloke e'ibora janapadata dine-raati (yetiya iccha tetiya'i) niraapade bhramana karaa’
